behavior: #0After approaching the large doors-1st time
subdialogue_text: Unknowing visitor, return from whence thou camest.

behavior: #0After approaching the large doors-1st time
subdialogue_text: The Abyss runneth deep. By the King's decree,

behavior: #0After approaching the large doors-1st time
subdialogue_text: None may disturb our mistress's slumber.

behavior: #0After approaching the large doors-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Turn back, unknowing visitor.

behavior: #0After approaching the large doors-2nd time
subdialogue_text: By the King's decree.

behavior: #0After traversing the fog to fight Halflight, Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: Foolishness. The King's decree is no trifling matter.

behavior: #0After traversing the fog to fight Halflight, Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: I, Judicator Argo, shall deliver thee justice.

behavior: #0After traversing the fog to fight Halflight, Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: ...Spear of the Church, sworn defender of our Princess Filianore!

behavior: #0After traversing the fog to fight Halflight, Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: Harken to the call that summons thee!

behavior: #0After traversing the fog to fight Halflight, Spear of the Church
subdialogue_text: Make haste!

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & approaching doors-1st time
subdialogue_text: Spear of the Church, turn back.

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & approaching doors-1st time
subdialogue_text:
The Abyss runneth deep.
Thou'rt sworn to protect our mistress's slumber.

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & approaching doors-1st time
subdialogue_text:
Or wouldst thou thy covenant forsake,
in violation of the King's decree?

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & approaching doors-2nd time
subdialogue_text:
Or wouldst thou thy covenant forsake,
in violation of the King's decree?

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & traversing the fog
subdialogue_text: Foolishness. To forswear thy covenant and the King's decree.

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & traversing the fog
subdialogue_text: I, Judicator Argo, shall bring this defiled spear to justice.

subdialogue_text: ...Divine spear of Yore, sworn defender of our Princess Filianore!

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & traversing the fog
subdialogue_text: Harken to the call that summons thee.

behavior: #0After gaining rank 1 as a Spear of the Church & traversing the fog
subdialogue_text: Make haste!
